ai-snp2.11:3.1_0: I’ve given up the five kinds of sensual stimulation
ai-snp2.11:3.3_0: and who’s left the home life out of faith—
ai-snp2.11:3.4_0: let them make an end to suffering!
ai-snp2.11:4.3_0: In order to go on retreat,
ai-snp2.11:5.3_0: you must not live on for such a person,
ai-snp2.11:5.4_0: I don’t let the world be reborn in a world!
ai-snp2.11:6.3_0: With mindfulness immersed in the body,
ai-snp2.11:7.1_0: Turn away from the feature of things
ai-snp2.11:7.4_0: meditate on the ugly aspects of the body:
ai-snp2.11:8.2_0: give up the tendency to conceit;
ai-snp2.11:9.1_0: That is how the Buddha regularly advised Venerable Rāhula with these verses.
